Trade/Device Name(s): CDC Human Influenza Virus Real-time RT-PCR Detection and Characterization Panel
Submitter Information: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
Regulation Name(s): Reagent for detection of specific novel influenza A viruses
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): ABI 7500 Fast Dx Real-Time PCR instrument
Applied Biosystems 7500 FastDx Real-Time PCR Instrument with SIS software v1.4
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for CDC Human Influenza Virus Real-time RT-PCR Detection and Characterization Panel for qualitative detection and characterization of human influenza viruses using real-time RT-PCR.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of influenza virus type A or B and determination of seasonal human influenza A subtypes (A/H1, A/H3), presumptive identification of influenza A/H5 (Asian lineage), and provision of epidemiologic information for surveillance, using viral RNA from nasopharyngeal or nasal swab specimens on an ABI 7500 Fast Dx Real-Time PCR instrument.
